channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 8 Best Portable Power Stations (2024): Power Capacity, Portability, Camping, and More
item.description: Whether you're going off-grid or safeguarding against blackouts, these beefy, WIRED-tested batteries can keep the lights on.

item.title: Audible experiments with new AI features for tailored audiobook recommendations
item.description: Audible, the Amazon-owned audiobook service, continues to experiment with AI to improve audiobook discovery and offer customized recommendations. Rece...

item.title: The Viral ‘Goodbye Meta AI’ Copypasta Will Not Protect You
item.description: Resharing a post on Facebook, Instagram, or another social media platform is not how you legally protect your data or opt out of anything.

item.title: Meta acquires the Threads.com domain name

item.title: Best Headphones for Working Out (2024): Bose, Shokz, JLab
item.description: Rock your inner jock with a pair of sturdy, sweatproof, and tangle-proof headphones. Here are our favorites.

item.description: The European Commission has revealed a list of the first 100-plus signatories to the AI Pact — an initiative focused on getting companies to publish “...

item.title: The Most Capable Open Source AI Model Yet Could Supercharge AI Agents
item.description: A compact and fully open source visual AI model will make it easier for AI to take control of your computer—hopefully in a good way.

item.title: Final 3 days to score up to $600 in savings on TechCrunch Disrupt 2024 passes

item.title: MSI Stealth 18 AI Studio A1V Review: No AI Needed
item.description: If you look past all the AI features and marketing, there’s a powerful workhorse and gaming laptop under the hood.

item.title: Meta Connect 2024: How to watch the metaverse and generative AI event today
